S08n646:1: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamuniḥ punarapi sarvāvantaṃ śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma |
S08n646:2: śṛṇu tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ ! tvadīyaṃ vidyāmantrānusāriṇāṃ sakalasattvārthasamprayuktānāṃ sattvānām |
S08n646:3: yena jāpyante mantrāḥ yena vā jāpyante akṣasūtravidhiṃ sarvatantreṣu sāmānyasādhanopayikasarvamantrāṇām |
S08n646:4: taṃ śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru | bhāṣiṣye ||
S08n646:6: sādhu bhagavāṃ ! tad vadatu asmākamanukampārthaṃ sarvamantracaryānusamayapraviṣṭānāṃ sattvānāmarthāya sarvasattvānāṃ ca ||
S08n646:13: tadyathā - om kuru kuru sarvārthāṃ sādhaya sādhaya sarvaduṣṭa vimohani ! gaganābalambe ! viśodhaya svāhā |
S08n646:15: śodhanavedhanagṛhṇanavirecanādīni karmāṇi kuryāt prathamamakṣasūtreṣu vṛkṣaṃ cābhimantrayet |
S08n646:17: ekarātraṃ svape tatra svapne caiva sa paśyati ||
S08n646:20: tato'sau sādhako gacchet prātarūthāya taṃ tarum |
S08n646:21: cāpi paśyate svapnaṃ virūpaṃ vā mahotkaṭam ||
S08n646:22: varjayet taṃ taruṃ mantrī anyatraṃ vātha gaccheya |
S08n646:32: phalaṃ teṣu samādāya akupsāṃ prāṇibhiḥ sadā |
S08n646:38: saphalāṃ kurute karmāṃ aśeṣāṃ bhuvi ceṣṭitām |
S08n646:39: pūrvāyāṃ diśi ye śākhā tatrasthā phalasambhavā ||
S08n646:41: karoti vividhākārāṃ yatra siddhiḥ phalaiḥ sadā ||
S08n646:42: yā tu dakṣiṇato gacchet śākhā parṇānuśālinī |
S08n646:43: taṃ japī varjayed yasmāt sattvānāṃ prāṇahāriṇī ||
S08n646:45: akṣaiḥ taiḥ samaṃ japyāḥ śatrūṇāṃ pāpanāśanam ||
S08n646:47: adhaḥ śākhāvalambasthā phalā ye tu prakīrtitā ||
S08n646:48: gacched rasātalaṃ taistu dānavānāṃ ca yoṣitām |
S08n646:49: taiḥ phalaiḥ akṣasūtraṃ tu gṛhītā samprakīrtitā ||
S08n646:50: agho yā yāṃ tu nilayāḥ pātālaṃ tena taṃ vrajet |
S08n646:51: praviśya tatra vai divyaṃ saukhyāmāsādya jāpinaḥ ||
S08n646:55: gatvā tu dūrataḥ sthānaṃ śucau deśe tathā nityam ||
S08n646:59: tṛsaptaraṣṭa ekaṃ vā vārāṃ te ekaviṃśati ||
S08n646:69: grathenmantrī sadā hyukto akṣamālāṃ tu yatnataḥ ||
S08n646:70: sauvarṇamatha rūpyaṃ vā māṇikyaṃ sphāṭikaṃ samam |
S08n646:71: śaṅkhaṃ susāraṃ caiva mauktaṃ vāpi vidhīyate ||
S08n646:75: anyaṃ vā gulikāṃ kiñcit phalairvā dhātusambhavaiḥ ||
S08n646:77: śatāṣṭaṃ pañcaviṃśaṃ vā pañcāśaṃ caiva madhyamām ||
S08n646:79: sahasraṃ sāṣṭakaṃ caiva kuryānmālāṃ tu jyeṣṭhikām ||
S08n646:81: tato grathitumālā vai trimātrāṃ dvika eva vā ||
S08n646:89: snātvā śubhe ambhe sarite vāpi nirmale ||
S08n646:95: prakṣālya yatnato tasmāt tato gaccheduḍayaṃ tathā ||
S08n646:96: yathāsthānaṃ tu gatvā vai yatrāsau paṭamadhyamaḥ |
S08n646:98: śāstubimbe tathā nityaṃ bhuvi dhātuvare jine |
S08n646:104: parijapya tato mālāṃ rātrau tatraiva saṃnyaset |
S08n646:109: saphalaṃ siddhyaṃte mantrī dhruvaṃ tasya vidhikriyā ||
S08n646:111: svapne yadyasau dṛṣṭvā mālāṃ dadyā tathaiva ca ||
S08n646:112: amoghaṃ tasya siddhyante mantrā sarvārthasādhakā || iti |
S08n646:114: āryamañjuśriyamūlakalpād madhyamapaṭavidhānavisarād dvādaśamaḥ akṣasūtravidhipaṭalavisaraḥ parisamāpta iti ||
